fmc_insecure_skip_verify.Description: Skip certificate checks if the certificate is not public CA signed, or if using IP address

fmc_password.Description: Password for the user to login to FMC

fmc_username.Description: Username for the user to login to FMC

default_action.Description: Default action for this resource, "BLOCK", "TRUST", "PERMIT", "NETWORK_DISCOVERY" or "INHERIT_FROM_PARENT".

default_action_base_intrusion_policy_id.Description: Default action base policy ID to inherit from for this resource

default_action_id.Description: The ID of default action of this resource

default_action_log_begin.Description: Enable logging at the beginning of the connection for this resource, "true" or "false

default_action_log_end.Description: Enable logging at the end of the connection for this resource, "true" or "false"

default_action_send_events_to_fmc.Description: Enable sending events to FMC for this resource, "true" or "false"

default_action_syslog_config_id.Description: Syslog configuration ID for this resource

default_action_type.Description: The type of default action of this resource

access_policy_id.Description: Id of access policy this category belongs to

acp.Description: The ID of the ACP this resource belongs to

category.Description: The Category of the ACP this resource belongs to. Should be created upfront with fmc_access_policies_category resource

insert_after.Description: The rule number after which to insert this resource

insert_before.Description: The rule number before which to insert this resource

log_begin.Description: Enable logging at the beginning of connection for this resource

log_end.Description: Enable logging at the end of connection for this resource

log_files.Description: Enable logging files for this resource

new_comments.Description: New comments to be added for this resource

send_events_to_fmc.Description: Enable sending events to FMC for this resource

syslog_config.Description: Syslog configuration ID for this resource

syslog_severity.Description: Syslog severity for this resource, "ALERT", "CRIT", "DEBUG", "EMERG", "ERR", "INFO", "NOTICE" or "WARNING"

object_type.Description: Type of Dynamic Object. Allowed values: IP

dynamic_object_id.Description: ID of dynamic object to be used for mapping

mappings.Description: List of IPs to be mapped to dynamic object

nat_policy.Description: The ID of the NAT policy this resource belongs to

nat_type.Description: The type of this resource, "static" or "dynamic"

perform_route_lookup.Description: Enable perform route lookups for this resource

translated_network_is_destination_interf.Description: Interface is the destination translated network

nat_policy.Description: The ID of the NAT policy this resource belongs to

nat_type.Description: The type of this resource, "static" or "dynamic"

original_destination_port.Description: Original destination port for this resource

original_source_port.Description: Original source port for this resource

target_index.Description: Target index to place this resource

translated_destination_port.Description: Translated destination port for this resource

translated_source_port.Description: Translated source port for this resource

code.Description: The ICMP code for this resource

icmp_type.Description: The ICMP type for this resource

literals.Description: List of network literals to add

objects.Description: List of network objects to add
The list of port groups to add

action.Description: Action. Should be BLOCK_TUNNELS or ANALYZE_TUNNELS

interface_mode.Description: Interface mode for this security zone

effective_end_date.Description: Effective end date for this time range object (time in RFC3339 format)

effective_start_date.Description: Effective start date for this time range object (time in RFC3339 format)

recurrence.Description: List of URL objects to add

daily_end_time.Description: Daily end time for this recurrence (time in RFC3339 format)

daily_start_time.Description: Daily start time for this recurrence (time in RFC3339 format)

end_day.Description: End day for this recurrence (time in RFC3339 format)

end_time.Description: End date for this recurrence (time in RFC3339 format)

start_day.Description: Start day for this recurrence (time in RFC3339 format)

start_time.Description: Start date for this recurrence (time in RFC3339 format)

literals.Description: List of URL literals to add

url.Description: The value URL for this resource

objects.Description: List of URL objects to add
